items.value: Create own slime
Enter slime name
Settings
Game Over
Your slime died. Create new one
Simple lightning
Simple but effective lightning magic that allows you to get a small amount of energy.
Lightning Storm
Medium-level magic that summons a large number of electrical discharges. This energy is enough to charge a simple laptop.
Lightning Shield
The best defence is an offence. This magic gathers the raging lightning in one place and receives energy from it. Not a nuclear power plant, but not bad either.
Lightning Power
Having understood the essence of this world, a magician can easily catch lightning with his bare hands and draw energy from the heavens. What sacrifices are made to charge a Tesla...
Lightning Rod
A powerful artefact that increases the total power of the mage by 100 times. No! 1000 times.
Lightning Core
The pinnacle of lightning magic. As powerful as 500 nuclear power plants, it costs as much as 5000. Allows you to get energy directly from the air.

Slime
Level
Energy
Name
Your Slimes
Once upon a time, in a world filled with orcs and magic
There was a famous magician named Merlin. He was the most skilled wizard in all the land and could conjure up anything he set his mind to
One day, the orcs decided to launch a series of rocket attacks on the nearby city, causing widespread chaos and a total blackout
People were left in the dark, without electricity or any way to power their homes and businesses. The local authorities were at a loss as to what to do until Merlin stepped in
Merlin, being the brilliant wizard that he was, decided to use his magic to create a new source of electricity
He began by researching the properties of slime and discovered that it contained magical properties that could generate a powerful charge
Without wasting any time, Merlin set to work, gathering magic slime from the most unlikely of sources - giant snails that roamed the nearby swamps
The snails' slime was said to contain an extra dose of magical properties and could generate a powerful electric charge
Merlin collected the slime and began to experiment. He used his magic to transform the slime into a conductive gel and used it to power the entire city
The result was a bright and steady glow that lit up the streets, homes, and businesses
People were amazed, and Merlin became an instant hero. He even went on to patent his invention and started selling jars of magic slime to people who wanted to generate their own electricity
Soon, the orcs stopped attacking, and the electricity grid was restored
However, people didn't want to give up the magic slime. It had become a trendy thing to have, and people were using it to power everything from their smartphones to their cars
Merlin, being the savvy businessman that he was, decided to start his own line of magic slime products, including shampoo, soap, and toothpaste
He even launched his own fashion line, which featured clothing made entirely out of slime. And so, Merlin became not just a famous magician but also a successful entrepreneur
All thanks to his invention of magic slime, the city was lit up, people's lives were transformed, and the world was a brighter place
The end! Let's make own electricity!
